name: Atelier Lise: The Alchemist of Orde
name_original: Atelier Lise: The Alchemist of Orde
description: Atelier Lise: The Alchemist of Orde (リーズのアトリエ 〜オルドールの錬金術士〜) is the 1st game in the Atelier series to be released for the Nintendo DS. Currently the game is only available in Japan. It is known by the project code DSA1. The game was directed by Shinichi Yoshiike, who is known as the "parent" of the Atelier series.
